content: knit with one hank of eco-cashmere the lyle cap is extremely soft and available in eight exquisite colors a great style for both men and women this cap is a wonderful advanced beginner project experience level * advanced beginner materials * eco-cashmere 50% recycled cashmere 50% virgin cashmere 50g/164yds 1 hanks * size 7 4 5 mm 16″ circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * size 7 4 5 mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurements * circumference 19″ / height 9″ color shown * no 1803 mineral bath
